about_the_game:
Embark on an action-packed adventure in a quirky food-themed stylized fantasy world and help three chefs on their path of vengeance against the mighty grease titan.
The game is focused on fast-paced action combat, fluidly switching between three chefs, odd characters and plenty of puns.
Prepare for more & Fry or Die!

Key Features


Food

  • Join the Tortilla Guerilla and explore their headquarter in a tomato sauce volcano.
  • Travel around the pastafari island and uncover the secrets of Parmesand Beach.
  • Fight against Captain Camenbeard and his cheese crew, evil Om-nom-onions and many more!

Fight
  • Use a broad arsenal of different skills and weapons to defeat your enemies. Whether it's some dual wielded battle baguettes, a fully automatic sausage shooter or a saucy pasta bow.
  • If that is not enough you can use mighty Breadcromancy to revive the unbread and have them fight by your side.

Fun
  • Meet a bunch of whacky characters like you have never seen before.
  • The Tortilla Guerilla needs you to find the remaining chefs and keepers of spices to unite the rebels against the grease titan.
  • Find ingredients and sacrifice holy meals to the gods of gluttony to gain more power.

Explore
The world of Delicacia is full of secrets, wacky characters, puzzles and puns to discover.
  • Use your spaghetti whip to swing across the map and reach distant places.
  • With some of Chili Willy's famous afterburner sauce closed doors can be melted open.
  • Slide across hot surfaces on your butter boots and perform some greasy tricks.




Stay tuned, there's more on the menu!

name: Cook-A-Geddon
short_description: Jump into a quirky action-adventure set in a stylized and food-themed fantasy world. Switch between three chefs and use your skills to fight against the mighty grease titan and his minions.Fast-paced action combat, odd characters and plenty of puns await you. FOOD! FIGHT! FUN!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
